title: Here She is, the Saint in Japan.
description: She was supposed to have been summoned as a saintess, but instead got thrown into a country called Japan. Alexandra Ollier, a.k.a. "Rei Natsukawa", hides her magical powers and works as an office worker for a small company in modern Japan. "As long as I can live peacefully and uneventfully, this is fine." says Rei, who faces many small troubles standing in the way of her lifestyle.
author: Shuu (守雨)
